name: Callan: Escape From Dungeon
description:
I put myself into the crazy challenge, a finished game in one week, thank Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021. It's really tough and time-consuming to make this kind of game, but I've done it, Yay to me...

The game is simple, you explore the dungeon, find the "Flying Stone", destroy it and open the gate to another level until you can escape from it. But danger lurks around every corner and try to kill you, you need to find food and water, manage your inventory and fight monsters, avoid traps to stay alive.

Some tips: 

-Drop unused item to mark the road ( no mini-map here)

-Rest to recovery Health and Stamina

-Blocking enemy's attack or run from them when you needed it

-Don't get hungry and thirsty 

-Play slowly and be careful, death mean game-over.

If you finished this game, please post screenshots or stream it on youtube, it'll make me very happy. Enjoy!
